src.transmission_gurobi.branch module

Declarations for the modelling components typically used for transmission lines

src.transmission_gurobi.branch.declare_eq_branch_power_ptdf_approx(model, parent_model, period, index_set, PTDF, rel_ptdf_tol=None, abs_ptdf_tol=None)[source]

Create the equality constraints or expressions for power (from PTDF approximation) at the branch level

Create equality constraints or expressions for power (from PTDF approximation) at the interface level

src.transmission_gurobi.branch.declare_ineq_p_branch_thermal_bounds(model, parent_model, period, index_set, branches, p_thermal_limits, approximation_type=ApproximationType.BTHETA, slacks=False, slack_cost_expr=None)[source]

Create an inequality constraint for the branch thermal limits based on the power variables or expressions at the branch level

src.transmission_gurobi.branch.declare_ineq_p_contingency_branch_thermal_bounds(model, parent_model, period, index_set, pc_thermal_limits, approximation_type=ApproximationType.PTDF, slacks=False, slack_cost_expr=None)[source]

Create an inequality constraint for the branch thermal limits based on the power variables or expressions att he contigency level

src.transmission_gurobi.branch.declare_ineq_p_interface_bounds(model, parent_model, period, index_set, interfaces, approximation_type=ApproximationType.BTHETA, slacks=False, slack_cost_expr=None)[source]

Create the inequality constraints for the interface limits based on the power variables or expressions at the interface level

src.transmission_gurobi.branch.declare_ineq_s_branch_thermal_limit(model, parent_model, period, index_set, branches, s_thermal_limits, flow_type=FlowType.POWER)[source]

Create the inequality constraints for the branch thermal limits based on the power variables.

src.transmission_gurobi.branch.generate_thermal_bounds(pf, llimit, ulimit, neg_slack=None, pos_slack=None)[source]

Create a constraint for thermal limits on a line given the power flow expression or variable pf, a lower limit llimit, a uppder limit ulimit, and the negative slack variable, neg_slack, (None if not needed) and positive slack variable, pos_slack, (None if not needed) added to this constraint.

src.transmission_gurobi.branch.get_power_flow_expr_ptdf_approx(model, branch_name, PTDF, rel_ptdf_tol=None, abs_ptdf_tol=None)[source]

Create a gurobipy power flow expression from PTDF matrix

src.transmission_gurobi.branch.get_power_flow_interface_expr_ptdf(model, interface_name, PTDF, rel_ptdf_tol=None, abs_ptdf_tol=None)[source]

Create a gurobipy power flow expression from PTDF matrix for an interface

src.transmission_gurobi.bus module

Declarations for the modeling components typically used for buses (including loads and shunts)

src.transmission_gurobi.bus.declare_eq_p_balance_ed(model, parent_model, index_set, bus_p_loads, gens_by_bus, bus_gs_fixed_shunts)[source]

Create the equality constraints for the real power balance at a bus using the variables for real power flows, respectively.

src.transmission_gurobi.bus.declare_eq_p_net_withdraw_at_bus(model, parent_model, index_set, bus_p_loads, gens_by_bus, bus_gs_fixed_shunts, dc_inlet_branches_by_bus=None, dc_outlet_branches_by_bus=None)[source]
